function.name: video_transcribe
function.description: Extract audio from video and transcribe using Whisper API. Supports time-based segmentation for large videos. Parallel processing (3 chunks at a time). Returns transcript as JSON with timestamps and execution timing.

operation.description: Operation to perform: transcribe (extract audio + Whisper API, returns full_text + timing) or get_info (video metadata only)

path.description: Path to video file (relative to project root, must be under docs/video/). Examples: 'docs/video/demo.mp4', 'docs/video/tutorials/intro.mov'

time_start.description: Start time in seconds (default: 0). Use for segmenting large videos. Example: 300 = start at 5 minutes

time_end.description: End time in seconds (default: video duration). Use for segmenting large videos. Example: 600 = stop at 10 minutes. Combine with time_start to transcribe a specific portion.

chunk_duration.description: Internal chunk size in seconds for Whisper API calls (default: 60s, min: 10s, max: 600s). Smaller chunks = more API calls but better parallelization. Larger chunks = fewer API calls but slower.
